UserProfile.title: User Profile
UserProfile.description: Represents a user's basic profile information.

createdAt.description: Timestamp of when the user account was created.

ProviderProfile.title: Provider Profile
ProviderProfile.description: Represents the professional profile of a service provider.

userId.description: The UID of the user who submitted this profile.

name.description: The name of the service provider or business.

tagline.description: A short, catchy tagline for the provider.

location.description: The physical location or service area.

address.description: The full street address of the business.

whatsapp.description: Contact WhatsApp number (international format without symbols).

description.description: A detailed description of the provider and their services.

services.description: A list of specific services offered.

imageUrl.description: URL of the provider's profile image.

Review.title: Review
Review.description: A review for a service provider.

providerId.description: The ID of the provider being reviewed.

userId.description: The UID of the user who wrote the review.

author.description: The name of the user who wrote the review. Should be their email.

rating.description: The star rating given by the user (1-5).

createdAt.description: Timestamp of when the review was created.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores user profile data, keyed by their auth UID.

/providers/{providerId}.description: Stores the public profile for a service provider. The 'providerId' is a unique identifier.

/providers/{providerId}/reviews/{reviewI.description: Stores reviews for a specific provider.
